name: Adidas Runners Move For The planet - Band Activation + Easy Run
about:
We’ll begin with a band warm-up, focused on mobility, activation, and injury prevention, reinforcing strong, sustainable movement. Then we’ll hit an easy pace for a community run, centred on connection and conscious effort.

🌱 Why it matters:
– Raises awareness for environmental impact through sport
– Promotes injury-free, mindful running
– Supports the global Move For The Planet initiative

This isn’t just a session—it’s a step toward a better planet.

name: Adidas Runners Move For The Planet - Easy Run
about:
This isn’t about speed—it’s about solidarity. We’ll move together at a relaxed pace, making space for conversation, connection, and a shared commitment to protecting the planet we run on.

🌱 Why It Matters:
– Raise awareness around environmental impact
– Celebrate conscious movement
– Be part of a global initiative making a difference through sport

Whether you're a regular runner or just starting out, your steps count. Bring your energy, your crew, and your intention—we move as one.

name: Adidas Runners Aerobic Run & Stretching
about: Unlock your everyday potential with a steady-paced aerobic run that builds your endurance base. We finish strong with dynamic stretching—enhancing mobility, promoting recovery, and prepping you for the miles ahead. Designed for runners of all levels, this session is all about consistency, breath, and community.

name: Adidas Runners Move For The Planet - Easy Run
about: Move Freely, Train Powerfully. It is where rhythm meets resilience — a high-energy dance fitness session that blends music, movement, and sweat. Designed to improve cardio endurance, coordination, and joy, it’s fitness without the pressure, and movement that celebrates every step.

name: Adidas Runners Move For The planet - Core Activation & Easy Run
about: Join us in moving for more than just miles. This session pairs a grounding core workout with an easy-paced community run—designed to build strength, endurance, and purpose. Every step taken is part of a bigger movement for a healthier planet, reinforcing that change begins with motion.

name: Adidas Runners Move For The Planet - Easy Run
about: Move Freely, Train Powerfully. It is where rhythm meets resilience — a high-energy dance fitness session that blends music, movement, and sweat. Designed to improve cardio endurance, coordination, and joy, it’s fitness without the pressure, and movement that celebrates every step.

name: Adidas Runners Move For The Planet - Seed Run
about: This run plants the seeds of purpose. The Seed Run is a symbolic, community-driven activation where every stride represents action for the planet. It’s an easy-paced run that encourages reflection, unity, and a shared commitment to sustainability—because small steps can lead to big change.

name: Adidas Runners Plyometrics & Easy Run
about: Build explosive strength and elevate your stride. This session combines high-intensity plyometric drills to enhance power and agility, followed by an easy-paced run to activate endurance and recovery. Designed to improve performance, reduce injury risk, and add energy to your everyday running journey.

name: Adidas Runners Speed Session
about: Push your limits and train with intent. This session is focused on building pace, improving running economy, and sharpening your mental grit through intervals, sprints, and progressive runs. Designed for all levels, it's where effort meets elevation—and speed becomes a mindset.

name: Adidas Runners Move For The Planet - Easy Run
about: Move Freely, Train Powerfully. It is where rhythm meets resilience — a high-energy dance fitness session that blends music, movement, and sweat. Designed to improve cardio endurance, coordination, and joy, it’s fitness without the pressure, and movement that celebrates every step.
